movie_title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
title: Cynical attempt to cash in on original Star Wars trilogy
review: The 'Phantom Menace' makes an interesting comparison to the 'South Park, Bigger, Longer, Uncut'.  One film (South Park) while having incredibly profane dialog, does have a plot, character development and a moral lesson. The other (Phantom Menace) has wooden acting but overflows with special effects and seems to say slavery is a natural condition and should not be stopped.
